name: route

params.description: API key for services call (route and autocomplete services). The key "calcul" is used by default.
params.name: options.apiKey

params.description: use of ssl or not (default true, service requested using https protocol)
params.name: options.ssl

params.description: Specify if widget has to be collapsed (true) or not (false) on map loading. Default is true.
params.name: options.collapsed

params.description: Specify if button "Export" is displayed. For the use of the options of the "Export" control, see {@link ol.control.Export}
params.name: options.export

params.description: list of exclusions with status (true = checked). By default : no exclusions checked.
params.name: options.exclusions

params.description: list of resources, by default : ["Voiture", "Pieton"]. The first element is selected.
params.name: options.graphs

params.description: route service options. see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~route Gp.Services.route()} to know all route options.
params.name: options.routeOptions

params.description: autocomplete service options. see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~autoComplete Gp.Services.autoComplete()} to know all autocomplete options
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions

params.description: options to use your own markers. Object properties can be "departure", "stages" or "arrival". Corresponding value is an object with following properties :
params.name: options.markersOpts

params.description: marker base64 encoded url (ex "data:image/png;base64,...""). Mandatory for a custom marker
params.name: options.markersOpts.url

params.description: Offsets in pixels used when positioning the overlay. The first element in the array is the horizontal offset. A positive value shifts the overlay right. The second element in the array is the vertical offset. A positive value shifts the overlay down. Default is [0, 0]. (see http://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.Overlay.html)
params.name: options.markersOpts.offset

params.description: Layer informations to be displayed in LayerSwitcher widget (only if a LayerSwitcher is also added to the map)
params.name: options.layerDescription

params.description: Layer title to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.title

params.description: Layer description to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.description
